-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fsweb.address
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    street character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    no integer NOT NULL,
    city character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    country character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    description text,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fsweb.customer
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    first_name character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    email character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    salary double precision NOT NULL,
    address_id bigint,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT uq_address_id UNIQUE (address_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fsweb.account
(
    id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    account_name character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    money_amount double precision NOT NULL,
    customer_id bigint,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS fsweb.customer
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (address_id)
    REFERENCES fsweb.address (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS fsweb.account
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (customer_id)
    REFERENCES fsweb.customer (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
